text:
FYI- Check out the attached. It's my tone meter with my first reply  :)
Message 171 of 4024
4:30 would be better. I am assuming that we can take his laptop and do it here?
Sent:01/01/2024 at 09:38 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/02/2024 at 01:42 AM)
Subject:Re: AD
Message 172 of 4024
Just fyi that I am not looking for a “ready, set, go” flurry of emails back and forth on here this morning. The whole thought of diving into that pattern
gives me anxiety. And neither of us need that right now.
It’s your first day back and you will have a ton on your plate. I don’t want to divide your time with the noise here. I wish we had a better relationship
and it was more constructive but we don’t and it’s not.
Good luck today.
Sent:01/02/2024 at 07:02 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/02/2024 at 07:27 AM)
Subject:Your fist day Back
Message 173 of 4024
Thank you. I appreciate that.
Sent:01/02/2024 at 07:27 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/02/2024 at 07:28 AM)
Subject:Re: Your fist day Back
Message 174 of 4024
We were having a peaceful conversation. I agreed with what you said- to go to Debbie. And you are escalating by hanging up, refusing to work with
me on the kids and now blocking me. I don’t understand
Sent:01/02/2024 at 04:56 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/02/2024 at 04:58 PM)
Subject:Please unblock me
Message 175 of 4024
That is an absolute mischaracterization of the conversation.
DO NOT EMAL MY WORK EMAIL as I have asked you to repeatedly refrain from.
Sent:01/02/2024 at 05:01 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/02/2024 at 05:02 PM)
Subject:Re: Please unblock me
